LanguageData.WAW.FoundZeroPawns: No combat pawns were found at this tech level.
LanguageData.WAW.NoCustomPawnKinds: No custom pawn kinds found. Please create a new one.
LanguageData.WAW.YouCanRename: Did you know you can rename warbands?
LanguageData.WAW.ZeroFound: No active warbands are available for raiding.
LanguageData.WAW.AddSkillToSoldier: Add {0} points to the {1} skill for all soldiers.
LanguageData.WAW.NotImplemented: The recruiting skill is not yet implemented.
LanguageData.WAW.LootValueBuff: Silver returned will be {0}% of the loot's value.
LanguageData.WAW.ExplainExp: Experience can be gained by raiding, defending, or using the "Interact" button of the warband.
LanguageData.WAW.RespawnChance: Soldiers have a {0}% chance to avoid being counted as dead when killed.
LanguageData.WAW.RecruitCost: Recruiting new soldiers costs {0}% less silver.
LanguageData.WAW.QualityOverride: All gear quality will be set to {0}.
LanguageData.WAW.CantDroppod: Cannot perform a drop pod raid
LanguageData.WAW.CantMove: Cannot move from one place to another
LanguageData.WAW.ModNotLoaded: The mod {0} is required for this option.
LanguageData.WAW.RequireSkill: Requires at least level {1} in the leader's {0} skill.
LanguageData.WAW.SelectOneRequest: Please select at least one custom pawn kind.
LanguageData.WAW.CastersOverflow: There can be at most 3 psycasters.
LanguageData.WAW.RecruitPsycasters.Desc: Recruit trained psycasters from the empire. Sending these psycasters out costs eltex.
LanguageData.WAW.EltexTip: You can click on one of the three slots to clear the selection.
LanguageData.WAW.FactionOverride: Decide the warband's faction type. This will override the ideology (Ideology DLC) and race (HAR mod) of generated soldiers.
LanguageData.WAW.InsufficientPsycaster: No psycaster in the team. Please recruit more from the "Recruit Psycasters" window.
LanguageData.WAW.SaveVillage.Desc: A group of villagers needs your help! They claim that some raiders recently took over their settlement and are begging for help from our troops. \nThey have promised to join the league and provide services for our warbands.
LanguageData.WAW.FactionsUnhappy: Your action will reduce cohesion by {0}.
LanguageData.WAW.GiveDevelopmentPoints: Your action will give {0} development points to your league.
LanguageData.WAW.NoFactionsInLeague: There's zero faction in your league
LanguageData.WAW.RoadConstruct.Info: You can only select player bases or vassal settlements.
LanguageData.WAW.CombatPowerOutOfLimit: Combat power of this pawnkind is above limit ({0}).
LanguageData.WAW.EquipmentImprovingPolicy: This policy increases the max combat power of soldier you can select(+{0}).
LanguageData.WAW.HowToFireArtillery: To fire these rounds, use warband's attack command button on an open map, there will be an extra option.
